desc.p: This is a multi valued field. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.
Fields SEC.DEPOT to SEC.DEPOT.AC form a related multi value set. Standard T24 customer field.
Mandatory input.
A maximum of 10 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the CUSTOMER.SECURITY file.
Fields SEC.DEPOT to SEC.DEPOT.AC form a related multi value set. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
Mandatory input.
A maximum of 16 characters may be entered.
Standard T24 numeric field.
A maximum of 7 characters may be entered.
This is a no input, no copy field.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 20 characters may be entered.
Standard T24 numeric field.
A maximum of 7 characters may be entered.
This is a no input, no copy field.
Standard T24 numeric field.
A maximum of 7 characters may be entered.
This is a no input, no copy field.
Mandatory input.
A maximum of 11 characters may be entered.
